name: Corsi Block
description:
Corsi Block aims to improve your visual/auditory memory. Try to memorize the highlighted blocks.

There are 3 game types:

  1. 3D
  2. 2D
  3. Auditory/Visual

In 3D and 2D you must memorize the highlighted blocks' positions, and select them based on the level's order.

Each level can have 3 orders:

  • No order: It doesn't matter in which order you select the blocks
  • In order: You have to select from the first highlighted block to the last.
  • Reverse Order: You have to select from the last highlighted block to the first one.
